package.name: Exit_Screen_Pop_Up
package.summary: Lure your customers into staying at your store while they intent to exit by offering exciting offers.
package.description:
Exit Screen Pop-up extension allows you to display offers and promotions to customers while they intent to leave the website. Attractive promotional offer Pop-up will be displayed when user scrolls out of the website window.
Simple 5 minute setup, and your Exit Pop-up screen is ready to wow your customers. Follow these steps to have it setup instantly:
1) Download the extension from Magento Connect. 2) Configure the extension from System >> Configuration >> Exit Screen Pop-up. 3) Enter promotional offers in the static block.
Read our How To Use section for further information.
Need Support? Click Here
Demo Link: http://extensiondemo.vsourz.co/
Feature
- It is used to display Pop-up when visitor intents to close the window or moves to another website. - It will give you a second chance at converting your visitor into a buyer. - It allows admin to set time interval until the next Pop-up appears. So if any user chooses to close it explicitly then Pop-up will not appear again until cookie expires or deleted from browser manually. - Admin will have the capability to control the pages where Pop-up appears. - Admin has full control over the content to be displayed in Pop-up. - Built with Animated effect (CSS3) - No technical knowledege is required to set it up.
How to use? 1. Install the extension from Magento Connect. 2. Goto System >> Configuration >> Exit Screen Pop-up 3. Enable Extension : Yes / No (Select yes for enable) 4. Pages : Select pages in which Pop-up should be displayed. 5. Promotional Blocks : Choose the block to be displayed as Pop-up 6. Load JQuery Library : Select YES if JQuery library in not included in your Magento Project 7. Cookie Interval : Total time (In Hours) until cookie expires. This will enable admin to control the time until which next Pop-up shouldn't appear. 8. Delay Pop-up : Total time (In Minutes) after which Pop-up should appear 9. Pop-up Width and Height : Enter width or height in pixel
